name: Raven Fighter
description:
Raven Fighter is a new classic shoot 'em roguelite game with endless maps, a rich weapon system, and the challenge to defeat the ultimate boss within 30 minutes.
Features:
- Automatic attacks and directional movement to evade enemies.
- Choose from 6 characters, each with unique attribute
- Play for 30 minutes to achieve the victory.
- Hundreds of weapons to choose.
- Defeat numerous enemies to gain experience and acquire weapons.
- Endless map system, allowing free flight, and unexpected rewards for destroying asteroids.
